#summary Short summary of changes for the current build of OLS Dialog. (Note that this may not be the same as the released version.)

----

 * NEW FEATURE: Browse ontology feature added.
 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: Multiple line tool tips added to the meta data tables, which are shown if the text is too long to display.
 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: Help texts extended.
 * BUG FIX: Fixed an incorrect default subject in the mailto links.
